edu.vt.cbil.visda.comp
Class CVMCore

java.lang.Object
  edu.vt.cbil.visda.comp.CVMCore

public class CVMCore
extends java.lang.Object

The class performs clustering model selection and validation tasks for VISDA

Version:
visda_v0.1
Author:
Jiajing Wang

Field Summary
(package private)  int level
          the index of current level
(package private)  double[][] mu0
          the initial Means of clusters in t-space; each row is for one cluster
(package private)  int numFeatures
          the number of features
(package private)  int numSamples
          the number of samples
(package private)  int numSubClusters
          the number of clusters at the current sub-level
(package private)  double[] w0
          the initial mixing proportions of all clusters
(package private)  double[][] Zjk0
          the initial posterior probabilities of all samples belonging to all clusters at the current level; each column is for one cluster

          Create a CVMCore instance

          This method prints the initial parameters of selected model

          Model selection at Top level, including cluster initialization and MDL validation; MDL will be developed in the next version.

Constructor Detail

CVMCore

public CVMCore(int n,
               int p)
Create a CVMCore instance

Parameters:
n - the number of samples
p - the number of genes
Method Detail

veMselect

public void veMselect(Plot2DViewer plotPanel,
                      double[][] D,
                      double[][] W)
Model selection at Top level, including cluster initialization and MDL validation; MDL will be developed in the next version.

Parameters:
plotPanel - the 2D projection panel, on which the cluster center pointers will be clicked
D - the matrix data
W - the top 2 components for projection

veMselect2

public void veMselect2(Plot2DViewer[] plotPanels,
                       double[][] D,
                       double[][][] WW,
                       double[] w_up,
                       double[][] MU_up,
                       double[][] Zjk_up)
Model selection at Sub level, including cluster initialization and MDL validation MDL will be developed in the next version.

Parameters:
plotPanels - the 2D projection panels for all sub-clusters; on each of them, the cluster center pointers will be selected
D - the matrix data
WW - an array of the top 2 components; each sub-cluster has its own top 2 components
w_up - the mixing proportions at the upper level
MU_up - the mean of clusters at the upper level
Zjk_up - the posterior probabilities of all samples belonging to all clusters at the upper level; each column is for one cluster

print

public void print()
This method prints the initial parameters of selected model
